text: “ Keeping Up With the Kardashians ” star Kim Kardashian and husband Kanye West celebrated their three - year wedding anniversary Wednesday, and Kim marked the occasion with a special release of behind - the - scenes photos on her app. “ Happy three - year anniversary babe! ” she wrote. “ Thank you for being the best husband and father. I love you so much. ” In addition to the note, Kardashian posted a number of intimate pictures of her wedding in Florence, Italy. They included sweet photos of North at just 11 months old, Kardashian ’ s one - of - kind wedding gown by Givenchy Creative Director Riccardo Tisci as well as a few tender moments between Kardashian and West at the couple ’ s pre - wedding dinner at the Palace
